## lintDirectory() function

Lint the specified directory and its children.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function lintDirectory(directory: string, config: Config, fix: boolean, onMissing?: (index: string, file: string) => void): string[];
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  directory | string | The directory to be linted. |
|  config | [Config](./core.config.md) | A lint-ts-index configuration to use. |
|  fix | boolean | True if the linter should try to fix the issues, false otherwise. |
|  onMissing | (index: string, file: string) =&gt; void | An optional function that will be called when a missing export has been found. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string\[\]

The list of files or directories not exported by `index.ts`<!-- -->.
